parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.16
</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> DLC

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an array of the DLC usage times.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getDLCAssetsUsage]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - array of DLC usage informations, containing DLC items in format:<br>
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[name, dlcAppId, sessionTime, totalTime], [name, dlcAppId, sessionTime, totalTime], (…)]<br>
'''NOTE:''' unused assets won't appear in the result (usage time <template><title>=</title></template> 0).

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_dlcAssetsUsageInfo = [[getDLCAssetsUsage]];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[getDLCs]], [[getObjectDLC]], [[getPersonUsedDLCs]], [[getMissionDLCs]], [[getDLCAssetsUsageByName]], [[getAssetDLCInfo]]

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name/>=<value> MP behaviour
</value></part></template></root>
